<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crown of the Fire Eater](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1435)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A wreath of flames dances around the rim of this golden crown. You gain resistance 5 to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72).

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> comman;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You take fire damage;  **Effect** You absorb some of the flame that would harm you. Increase your fire resistance from the crown from 5 to 15. Just after taking any remaining fire damage, you regain a number of Hit Points equal to 15 or the fire damage dealt by the triggering attack before damage resistance, whichever is less.
